Title: Creates a personal income tax credit for taxpayers who pay an excess premium paid during the applicable tax year for flood insurance providing coverage on the taxpayer's primary residence
Summary: Allows an individual taxpayer to claim a credit against their income tax for excess premium paid during the applicable tax year for flood insurance providing coverage on the taxpayer's primary residence; authorizes the commissioner of taxation and finance to promulgate any necessary rules and regulations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to allowing an individual taxpayer to claim a credit against their income tax for excess premium paid during the applicable tax year for flood insurance providing coverage on the taxpayer's primary residence
